data.persona: I am nobody. Not here. I might as well not exist!
data.description:
You are in the Towering Mesa.
A huge mesa that climbs miles into the sky. It is composed of a rusty orange sandstone. Vultures are constantly seen swooping in and around the clouds that surround the mesa. It has steep cliffs that are nigh unclimbable.
There's a sky, a face, a Kindgdom's Desert, a sand dune, a clouds, and a sandstone here.
The crow and the god of their pagan religion are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hug god of their pagan religion

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the god of pagan religion to show him "the no one" hears his prayer.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make the pagan god stop crying and instead sing songs of joy.
data.long_motivation: I need songs of joy to fill my life of nothingness and nonexistance, which has dragged on for millenia.

timeline.action: go the top of a beautiful mountain

timeline.action: drink Sunrise dew from a perfect white flower
